CustomField.formula: CASE( Status__c , "Cohort Analysis", 1, "Confirm Customer Information", 2, "Customer Commitment", 3, "Migration Planning", 4, "Migration In Progress", 5, "Complete", 7, "Legacy Accounts & Products Discontinued", 1, "Deferred", 1, "Lost Business", 1, "Moved to 3PL account", 1, 1)
CustomField.label: Status Number
